Articles.Content:
So, I just downloaded the newest version of the game, and the grabbing system seems to be very interesting. The only problem is that it doesn't work...

As you can see here, it won't grab the other vehicle. Does anyone know why?
Have you tried actually touching the other craft? The Klaw is basically a universal docking port - it needs to touch the other surface (at docking speed, so 1 m/s or less) to latch on.
From the description I figured it was some sort of "arm" that will extend in order to catch the other aircraft. I touched the two and it worked.
